name: laion/OIG
description: The Open Instruction Generalist Dataset (OIG) is our attempt to compile a large dataset of medium-quality instructions, along with a smaller high-quality instruction subset (OIG-small-chip2), all in jsonl format. Each dataset entry contains at least a 'text' field, and some may also include a 'metadata' field. The 'text' field is composed of 'human': instruction\n'bot': response sequences, with the full details available on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/laion/OIG. This dataset aims to advance Instruction Following, Natural Language Understanding (NLU), Dialogue Generation, and related tasks.
citeAs: @article{laion-OIG,   author    = {LAION},   title     = {Open Instruction Generalist Dataset (OIG)},    year      = {2023},   url       = {https://huggingface.co/datasets/laion/OIG},    }
creator: laion
keywords: Instruction following, Natural Language Understanding (NLU), Dialogue Generation
